  • About Me

    I’m Elias, a software engineer passionate about building scalable systems and creating intuitive solutions to everyday problems. I'm a rising junior at Santa Clara University studying Computer Science & Engineering and currently am a software development intern at The Hivery in Mill Valley, CA.


    On campus and beyond, I’ve been passionate about creating spaces that help others grow in technology. I’ve mentored peers in computer science courses, sharing insights on systems programming and data structures, and extended that impact by creating a YouTube channel dedicated to teaching programming concepts. I also use LinkedIn as a platform to share lessons learned and advice for students entering the field, building on years of tutoring and mentoring experience.


    I’ve gained hands-on experience through internships, hackathons, and collaborations where I worked on building scalable backend systems, optimizing algorithms and queries, and developing fullstack applications.
